diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $x - 5$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $54$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $28$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $C$.
The measure of angle $CAD$ is equal to the measure of angle $DAB$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABD$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
